# Gene Expression Analysis - GSE7390

This project demonstrates differential gene expression analysis using the GSE7390 breast cancer dataset.

**Tools Used**: R, GEOquery, limma, pheatmap

## Objectives
- Download and normalize GEO microarray data
- Identify differentially expressed genes
- Create heatmaps and volcano plots
- Perform pathway enrichment analysis

_Results and figures will be displayed here._
